concept.title: Pizza Ordering CLI & Receipt Generator overview
concept.shortdesc: This program collects pizza orders in a command-line flow and prints an itemized receipt with tax and totals.

section.title: Audience
section.p: Developers, QA testers, and technical writers documenting the ordering flow and receipt output.

ul.li: order.py: interactive CLI that collects pizza orders and calls the receipt generator.
pizzaReceipt.py: receipt generator that prints itemized pricing, tax, and totals.
test.py: test runner that exercises common input paths (mixed case, LIST, X, and q).

ol.li: Prompt to start an order (continue or quit).
Select a pizza size: S, M, L, XL.
Add toppings one per line; use LIST to display available toppings.
Enter X to finish the current pizza and optionally add another.
